title: Philosopher's Stone
description: A legendary substance said to enable the process of transmuting base metals into gold.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a crucible and heat to a high temperature. Note: Actual creation of the Philosopher's Stone is left as an exercise to the reader.

title: Elixir of Life
description: A mythical potion that, when drunk from a certain cup at a certain time, supposedly grants the drinker eternal life and/or eternal youth.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a silver chalice under the light of a full moon. Drink at the stroke of midnight.

title: Panacea
description: A remedy that would cure all diseases and prolong life indefinitely.
instructions: Grind all ingredients into a fine powder. Mix with spring water and drink while facing the rising sun.
